|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/08/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "BCM94331MC" appears to be silkscreened on the board. :This is presumably an 11n module for AP's. *[[Broadcom BCM94331MC]] rev.'''H2''' 3x3 :[[Broadcom]] BCM4331 3T3R 802.11'''bgn''' *[[Broadcom BCM94331MC]] rev.'''H5''' 3x3 :[[Broadcom]] BCM4331 3T3R 802.11'''an''' {{See also|Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC (UAP-AC)}} ==Notes== ===Specifications=== *[[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm4331 BCM4331] 802.11abgn 3T3R MAC/PHY/Radio *[https://github.com/rusxakep/asuswrt-security/blob/master/release/src-rt-6.x.4708/cfe/build/broadcom/bcm947xx/compressed/rt-ac56u_nvram.txt GitHub AsusWRT]
